subject: Missing Shipment Confirmation
description_text:
Dear Simsonn,
I'm writing to notify you that I still haven't received any emails from you
confirming the shipment of my order (order #SSN1703), which I purchased
nine days ago, on June 9, 2025.
I would appreciate it if you would kindly confirm that you actually
received my order and possibly when you are planning to send it.
Best regards
Andrea Perfetto

conversations.body_text: Hi Andrea Perfetto,  We will immediately look into it to check whether the tracking number was not entered.Â
